SEARCH
Package com.lovelettergame.cards

Class King

java.lang.Object
com.lovelettergame.Card
com.lovelettergame.cards.King
public class King extends Card
The King class represents a King card in the Love Letter game. Players can use this card to trade hands with another player of their choice.

    • effect

      public void effect(Player currentPlayer, List<Player> allPlayers, Scanner scanner)
      The effect of playing the King card. Players can trade hands with another player of their choice.
      Specified by:
      effect in class Card
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The current player who plays the King card.
      allPlayers - A list of all players in the game.
      scanner - A Scanner object for user input.
